Learning Objectives and References for Elective Course Students

  • Explain histologic classification of endometrial cancer
  • Explain molecular classification of endometrial cancer
    • https://www.annalsofoncology.org/article/S0923-7534(22)01207-8/fulltext
  • Explain microsatellite instability test
    • CAP guideline
      • https://meridian.allenpress.com/aplm/article/doi/10.5858/arpa.2021-0632-CP/484203/Mismatch-Repair-and-Microsatellite-Instability

      • https://www.sciencedirect.com/science/article/pii/S0923753419312694
    • Peptide nucleic acid probe (PNA)-mediated real-time PCR-based method
      • https://bmccancer.biomedcentral.com/articles/10.1186/s12885-018-5127-6

    • Immunohistochemistry
      • https://www.sciencedirect.com/science/article/pii/S0923753419312694

      • https://www.thebagp.org/wp-content/uploads/download-manager-files/1593411202wpdm_BAGP%20MMR%20IHC%20Interpretation%20June%202020.pdf

    • NM_000179.3(MSH6):c.2314C>T (p.Arg772Trp)
